name: Cabin Defense
description:
Defend your cabin from the invading monsters!  Try to survive the night in 1k mode.  Then try to last as long as possible in endless.

Game Play:

The goal of the game is to not let the monsters destroy your cabin.  The blue bar at the top is the cabins health if it empties it's game over.  The red bar on the right is your health if it empties you'll be temporarily stunned but recover after a few seconds.  Tutorial mode will explain the game controls and give you the basics.  1k arcade mode is the standard mode where you survive just 1k ticks on the clock.  Endless mode lets you go on forever with the enemies progressively getting stronger.

Controls:
WASD / Arrow keys:  Menu controls and move character up / down
J:  Fast attack does the most damage against unarmored enemies
L: Slower attack does extra damage against armored enemies and breaks their armor weaker for unarmored enemies
I: Uppercut stuns enemies temporarily watch for the red bar above enemies to stun there strong attacks
K: Heal combo use some unknown force to heal yourself by doing a combo

Game code, design & art done by Reabs using C++ (OpenGL & FMOD).  Engine was originally used in Major Jam 3: Retro(In OG Gameboy mode) was reworked to add color and multiple background layers but still stick with the palette functionality of gameboy color/advance ish limitations.  Used aseprite to make the art.  Originally it was a different game featuring a parachuter but I just wasn't feeling it so I scrapped it.  I then made a sprite that looked like myself and came up with a game that was similar to the bot that runs in my stream.

Audio done by AlloouTrick: Asked for comments from him:  "nothing in particular".

He made the audio on the last day when I just asked him in stream if he felt up to it.  He put out all the bangers in <2hrs.
